banner.title: Cookie Policy
banner.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

0.title: Technical cookies
0.description: Technical cookies are essential for the proper functioning of our website. These include:

table.0_description: Allows you to store the language selected by the user
table.1_description: Allows you to store the user's acceptance for the use of cookies

1.title: Analytical cookies
1.description: We use analytical cookies to collect information about how visitors use our website. This information helps us improve our website and the services we offer.

table.0_description: Allows you to understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting and reporting information anonymously

2.title: Consent
2.description: By continuing to browse our website, you consent to the use of these cookies. You can change your cookie preferences at any time in your browser settings.
